title: Momoiro Renka
sinopse:
Sakura prays in front of cherry blossoms in the hope of meeting her fated partner, suddenly a guy really does show up!! Believing he is her fated person, she seeks him out but Sakura meets with more than just her fated partner... (Source: Shrine Of Memories)

Includes Prologue & 1 extra:

-   Sketching The Color of Love
